EmailTemplate.name: 17.ComColl.SDP.none.N.G.N.14762.SDP Pilot campaign.SSE_CXO_2_Business_eBook
EmailTemplate.subject: There IS a way to boost revenues and cut costs simultaneously!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Boost revenues and cut costs simultaneously Ensuring profitability is a key concern in any company. For tier 2-4 operators, Nokia’s Secure Service Enablement approach can help you achieve this by protecting and growing your roaming revenues with tier 1 partners, while minimizing your off-network costs and reducing churn.
Our Business eBook explains how to:
- Protect and attract roaming revenues with tier 1 operators - Minimize the charges you incur when your subscribers roam - Attract new customers and prevent churn Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
